WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
         I have win 7, installed turbo c++ and run first program on it . It worked but after that my mouse did not work for turbo c++. The cursor moves but i can not click on compiler , run etc. Please someone help me solve this issue.

Comments.Message:
This is happens because of Turbo C++ 3.0 a 16-bit software and I'm using DosBox to run Turbo C++ for 32&64-bit OS. DosBox is a simulating tools, specially design to run 16-bit games on 32&64-bit OS. 

So, problem is that, DosBox design to operate with keyboard. When you tried to use mouse it's works for only few click.

Solution of this problem is Turbo C++ shortcut. You can find out here
[https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts](This is happens because of Turbo C++ 3.0 a 16-bit software and I'm using DosBox to run Turbo C++ for 32&64-bit OS. DosBox is a simulating tools, specially design to run 16-bit games on 32&64-bit OS. 

So, problem is that, DosBox design to operate with keyboard. When you tried to use mouse it's works for only few click.

Solution of this problem is Turbo C++ shortcut. You can find out here
https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts)
